game.description: Retrieve the lost artifact from the ancient temple.
game.objective: Find the artifact and return it to the quest giver.

tasks.description: Explore the deep jungle to find the entrance of the temple.
tasks.objective: Locate the hidden entrance to the ancient temple.

tasks.description: Solve the puzzles inside the temple to reach the artifact chamber.
tasks.objective: Overcome challenges and solve puzzles to reach the artifact chamber.

tasks.description: Defeat the guardian protecting the artifact.
tasks.objective: Defeat the ancient guardian and retrieve the lost artifact.

game.title: Temple of Lost Artifacts
